method.name: contains
method.description: It's a method that takes a string key as a parameter and returns a boolean value indicating whether the key exists in the data store.

method.name: get_key
method.description: It's a string that represents a single key in the data store. It allows you to retrieve a specific key from the data store by its index

method.name: get_value
method.description: It's a generic field that can hold any type of data. It allows you to store and retrieve data using a string key, and it can be used to store a variety of data types

members.member: It's an integer that represents the number of keys in the data store.
